Collision Theory.title: Collision Theory
Collision Theory.description:
Topics

  • Momentum
  • Conservation of Energy
  • Conservation of Momentum
  • Energy Transfer

Description

  • Explore different collisions and how momentum is always conserved in the system. See how kinetic energy is conserved on perfectly elastic collisions and how thermal energy is conserved on perfectly inelastic collisions. Observe how momentum is always conserved for this system.
